dict.acceptation: 预示（某事）；恐吓；危及；预示凶兆；

sent.orig: Threaten estimation is analysis the degree of target threaten.
sent.trans: 威胁估计是对目标威胁程度的估计。

sent.orig: At the very least, governments' additional funding requirements threaten to raise long-term interest rates.
sent.trans: 最起码，政府额外的融资要求可能会推高长期利率。

sent.orig: The cracks in turbine blades threaten the safety of running machine and lower economic profits.
sent.trans: 水轮机叶片裂纹严重威胁机组安全运行和降低经济效益。

sent.orig: They feared that new changes threaten their own interests and new thinking erodes their authorities.
sent.trans: 他们害怕新的变化危及自己的利益，也害怕新的思想侵蚀了自己的权威。

sent.orig: Joker: You have nothing, nothing to threaten me with. Nothing to do with all your strength.
sent.trans: 小丑：你不能拿任何、任何的东西威胁我，凭你的全部力量根本做不到任何事情！
